content:
Uzhgorod servicemen stopped four citizens of Ukraine who intended to illegally cross the Ukrainian-Slovak border.

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

As it is noted, two of them detained a border outfit a few hundred meters from the state limit, which was served in a hidden way. Men made their way in the direction of Slovakia by the outskirts of Uzhgorod. One had a identity document, the other had no one. Both were locals.

“In the course of further search activities, the border guards detained two other offenders. They were detected in the dark by thermal imaging. The men managed to overcome the barrier fence and approached the border when the patrol stopped. Both also turned out to be residents of Uzhgorod. The border guards found that they were moving with the previous detainees, but noticed law enforcement officers and tried to hide, ”the department said.

The SPSU also noted that all offenders were taken to the border unit for the purpose of drawing up administrative and legal documents and bringing accountable for attempting to illegally cross the state border. The cases will be transferred to court.

We will remind, in Bukovina stopped tourists who for 5.5 thousand eurosThey tried to reachto Romania.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Transcarpathia 800 meters to the borderThe taxi driver was detainedTogether with the evidence.
